channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 25th November
item.description:
More fly tipping from No 4, because they can't or won’t fill their bins correctly. Usually they dump on Thursday or Friday. Must have ‘guests’ now ?! These shots are from October but same today on 25th November. Unfortunately cctv power down.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Talbot Road, West Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Please remove.

item.title: Streetlights out in Belgrave Mews south, 25th November
item.description:
2 streetlights are out in belgrave mews south and it is very dark and unsafe at the end of the mews street. Please have these fixed as soon as possible. It seems to have been reported before. Thank you very much!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Belgrave Mews South, Belgravia, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 fridge freezers dumped, 25th November
item.description:
There have been 2 fridge freezers dumped on the pavement outside no 21 that have been there for several months .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brompton Drive, Slade Green, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flat renovation waste dumped on street, 25th November
item.description:
Its looks like someone working at 23 Lytcott grove has renovated a room...and dumped all the old stuff on the street. A door - left of the street - has written on it: 23 lycott Grove, Dirty Clean throughtout property including inside units, door stop x 1, small fridge x 1 etc etc.......(im not accusing anyone...just stating facts)....Hummm...I wonder if its from 23 Lytcott grove (it has been dumped outside of 23 Lycott Grove)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17-31, Lytcott Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: External light on rear of building, 25th November
item.description:
There is a newly installed security light on the rear of 2-8 Coopersale Rd which when on is lighting up the back of the houses opposite in Glyn Rd.Not sure which flat owns the light apart from its one of the ground floor ones.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Coopersale Road, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Flytipping alley Sternhall Lane, 25th November
item.description:
People dump rubbish here almost every day. Glad that it gets picked up when we report but we need a long-term solution! We think some flats in the area do not have a bin to put their rubbish in.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sternhall Lane, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves and box left in curb, 25th November
item.description:
A lot of damp slippery mushy leaves in gulley in the road blown over from the playing field opposite. Needs sweeping and mushy leaves collected. Visualky very messy in the street as well.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crouch Croft, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
